@hjortureh @Netlify @contentful Yep. I do exactly that. https://t.co/OKSq3DTRhA This site uses a bespoke SSG which I made myself, but the principle is exactly as you described. A gulp build gets the data from Contentful. Then an SSG builds it. Triggered by webhooks.
